set_block_at_pos.title: Set Block At Position
set_block_at_pos.description: Sets a block relative to this block to another block type.
set_block_at_pos.deprecationMessage: This event will be deprecated in 1.21.20 in favor of custom components

block_offset.title: Block Offset
block_offset.description: The offset from the block's center.

block_type.title: Block Type
block_type.description: The type of block to set.

set_block_at_pos.deprecationMessage: This property requires the following experimental toggle(s) enabled in your project config: 'holidayCreatorFeatures'.
